name: Reverge
description:
The photos are not part of the game.

Its a concept of what a single developer kid thats in middle school,can do in 1 day.

Story is not  complete.An idea of the story is:

U are a doctor that get captureted by complex,a corporation that want the indigo dna recipe that u own,u are put in a testing room after u get out of it ,Complex robots want to kill u.

RFH
